title: Uzuri Springs
description: Nestled in the thriving town of Ruiru, Kiambu County, this prime residential plot offers a perfect blend of serenity and accessibility. Spanning approximately 0.125 acres, it features fertile red soil ideal for landscaping or farming. Proximity to Thika Superhighway ensures quick commutes to Nairobi, while nearby schools, hospitals, and malls provide convenience. Embrace suburban charm in this rapidly developing area, ideal for your dream home or investment.
